name: Dots Go 3D
description:
A puzzle game that will keep you busy for a while.
A series of 5 or more bubbles will be removed once they are organized as 5 or more consecutive bubbles with the same color.
variants of figures:
- 5 balls in horizontal, vertical or diagonal line
- 4 balls in the shape of a cross
- 8 balls in the shape of a square
